CutSceneText.Text: Some of the memories have returned -- not all...not yet.
I could feel...Something. The imprint of...His presence.
Yes, it would appear there was some contact with Him.
And it isn't quite clear exactly what was gleaned from the Artifact.
So we're left with no real clue to what He really wants.
And we won't...until He makes his move.
Waiting is all we can do for now.
Have you heard anything more from Lord Kaisinel?
Only what Lord Vaizel already reported...nothing more.
So it would seem Lord Kaisinel is having considerable difficulty.
Well, yes, he is facing Balaur Lord Tiamat, after all.
And Lord Marchutan of Asmodae, as well....
Be ready to send additional support, just in case it's needed.
